title: WTB: T206 Seymour (Portrait) and/or Bridwell (With Cap) lower grade
author: obcbeatle

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Seymour (Portrait) and/or Bridwell (With Cap) lower grade
posts.post_content: In Poor to Good range. With a common back. Raw or graded. No missing paper front or back. OC OK. Creases OK unless right through the face. Will need pics. I’m a member of OBC. PPFF. Private message please. Thanks. Jerry.
